attributes.action: acknowledge and reinforce the absolute right of ALL workers to withdraw their labour if all other attempts to obtain a fair deal have failed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ONLY thing employees have to sell is their labour; and the gap between the incomes of "fat cat" employers and their staff is growing almost by the day.  Employers seem to have almost all the power and the only weapon against this that employees have is industrial action.  If employers were more prepared to share power, and/or to give their workers a fairer share of profits (which they could not make without their labour)such action would become less necessary; or possibly totally unnecessary.
